text:
@StephenAtHome @DrLaPook More importantly, what was @SHAQ looking at up and to his right...over and over during that interview?
A clock?
Another samurai sword?
ESPN Highlights of the 11/10/99 game vs. the Rockets where he and Barkley got ejected? 😉
#LoveYaShaq
